Author: girlinamber
Text: yup, that sounds about right lol. it's really tough, i hate it. im usually okay with 2 or 3 unnoticeable lbs, but i know i've put on more and it's super noticeable. i swore i'd never use another scale again, though ðŸ˜ª the struggle is real

Author: watchmedisapr
Text: We are literally the same person. * I've been off work for a year * I've been basically in bed for 9 months * I've put on binging weight * I've been majorly depressed and had thoughts suicidal ideation * I've got a bad spine (scoliosis with Harrington rod) * I want to start ec stacking again, but I'm afraid of how that will effect my anxiety.
